text.1: This is a collection of components build on top of angular material to make it easier to use it. Additionally little helpers could be found.
text.examples: Collection of conmponents and utilities based on the angular material library.
text.table: Easy way to use a table, without the need to implement the headers and columns by your own.
text.options: sortable (default: true) - set to false to disable sorting
text.enum:
Sometimes it is hard to handle enums, but it is important to use an enum instead of just using a number or a string.
Here you can find some little helpers, which enable you to use enum for material select or in the tempalte as a string very easily.
text.enum_options: Easy way to use a typescript enum as source of the material select.
text.pipe: The pipe provides an easy way to get the selected key of an enumeration in the template.
text.dialogs: This library provides a way to use dialogs in your application.

confirm_delete.title: Confirm delete
confirm_delete.content: Do you really want to delete this item?
